snippet.title: Earthblade Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2022
snippet.description: Celeste creator Maddy Makes Games showed off their follow-up to the critically acclaimed game; the Metroidvania-style Earthblade. The game features Celete's classic pixel-art look as you explore it's sprawling world and melancholic tone.
